extensionDescription.message: Quickly access your favorite sites with shortcut keys and search.

startupKeyHelp.message: You can change the startup key at Keyboard shortcuts on the extensions screen (Menu > More tools > Extensions).

startupKeyHelpShort.message: * Can be changed in Chrome's shortcut settings

columnCountHelp.message: The number of columns in the shortcut key list displayed on the popup.

filterOnPopup.message: Interactive filter of shortcut keys on the popup

disabledSyncHelp.message: Regardless of this option, if browser sync is disabled, it will not be synchronized.

hideOnPopup.message: Hide in shortcut key list displayed in popup

aliasesHelp.message: Alternative names for searching. Separate multiple entries with commas.

tagsHelp.message: Tags for categorization. Also used in search.

errorMessage.message: There is an input error. Please check the input contents.

duplicateKeyMessage.message: It duplicated with other shortcut keys({keys}).

importError.message: Could not import due to invalid format.

syncError.message:
Synchronization was disabled because it could not be saved to sync storage.
If there are too many shortcut keys, saving to sync storage will fail.

action_6.message: Open current tab in incognito window

tooltip_key.message: Type this key in the popup to execute this shortcut. Example: Type GM to open Gmail

tooltip_action.message: Select what happens when the shortcut is executed. Jump to existing tab, open in new tab, execute script, etc.

tooltip_title.message: The name displayed in the popup and settings screen

tooltip_aliases.message: Alternative names for searching. Adding Japanese or abbreviations makes it easier to find

tooltip_tags.message: Tags for categorization. Setting categories like 'Work' or 'SNS' helps with search and organization

tooltip_url.message: The destination URL. Enter the complete URL starting with https://

tooltip_script.message: JavaScript to execute after page load. Useful for automation after login

tooltip_hideOnPopup.message: When checked, this won't appear in the popup list, but can still be executed by key input

tooltip_urls.message: Register up to 5 URLs to open at once. All will open in new tabs simultaneously
